name: Body-Ups
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground, hip-width apart.

2. Engage your core muscles by drawing your belly button towards your spine.

3. Slowly lift your torso off the floor, keeping your shoulders down and away from your ears.

4. As you lift up, contract your abdominal muscles to support your body's movement.

5. Hold this position for a brief moment, ensuring proper posture and engagement of the core.

6. Gradually lower yourself back down to the starting position, controlling the movement with your abdominal muscles.

7. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Body-ups are an isolation exercise that targets the rectus abdominis muscle, also known as the abs.
